name: Fresh Pineapple Margaritas
description: We like the light caramel flavors of reposado tequila in these margaritas, but you can substitute blanco tequila if it's all you have on hand.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups fresh pineapple chunks (about 1/2 pound, from 1 small pineapple)
1 1/2 ounces (3 tablespoons) fresh juice from about 2 lemons
2 1/4 ounces (4 1/2 tablespoons) fresh juice from 3 to 4 limes
6 ounces (3/4 cup) Cointreau or triple sec

recipeInstructions.text: Add pineapple, lemon juice, lime juice, simple syrup, salt, tequila, and triple sec to a blender with 3 ice cubes. Blend until completely smooth and frothy. Pour into a pitcher if desired and refrigerate up to 3 hours. Serve over ice.
